snippet: The Nassau County police responded to a 911 call on Sunday morning from a home in Elmont, N.Y., and found the dog attacking the child. The police shot and killed the pit bull.
lead_paragraph: The Nassau County police responded to a 911 call on Sunday morning from a home in Elmont, N.Y., and found the dog attacking the child. The police shot and killed the pit bull.

headline.main: 9-Year-Old Girl Is Killed by a Pit Bull on Long Island
